parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end timestamp of the sub-task.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20

parameters.name: RelateInfo
parameters.description: Specifies whether extension information is associated.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start timestamp of the sub-task.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The type of the sub-task. Valid values:

*   **IMAGE_SCAN**: image scan task
*   **IMAGE_REGISTRY_PULL**: image asset synchronization task
